summary: This module provides a comprehensive suite of unit tests for the ANSYS MAPDL launcher, exercising helper utilities, command‑generation logic, environment and licensing handling, version verification, and error‑handling pathways across different operating systems and HPC configurations.
business_intent: Validate that the MAPDL launcher reliably starts ANSYS MAPDL in diverse environments, correctly interprets configuration options, manages resources and licenses, and gracefully handles failures, thereby ensuring robust simulation workflow execution for end users.
